hero.subcopy1: Confidence in bare skin unlocks your beauty.
hero.subcopy2: 3.5 billion years of vitality for porcelain-smooth skin.
hero.label: Meets quasi-drug ingredient standards

concept.label: CONCEPT
concept.p1: Mother Vegetables Confidence recreates the Earth’s earliest lifeform, born 3.5 billion years ago. We call it “Mother Vegetables.”
concept.p2: Feel the mystery of the first life on your own skin. Superb adhesion controls sweat and tackiness through the day, keeping your skin smooth and beautiful.
concept.p3: An organic formula that meets quasi-drug ingredient standards and is gentle on skin. In just 5 seconds each morning, achieve clear, porcelain-like skin.
